label: SimpleParser
OperationType
peekOfCode:
class OperationType(Enum):
    """Типы операций"""
    DECLARE = "declare"
    ASSIGN = "assign"
    ADD = "add"
    SUB = "sub"
    MUL = "mul"
    DIV = "div"
    MOD = "mod"
    EQ = "eq"

label: Operation
peekOfCode:
class Operation:
    type: OperationType
    value: Optional[str] = None
    left: Optional['Operation'] = None
    right: Optional['Operation'] = None
    args: List['Operation'] = field(default_factory=list)
    line: int = 0
    column: int = 0
    var_type: Optional[str] = None
@dataclass
